name: freeCodeCamp Python Courses
description: A comprehensive set of free Python courses offered by freeCodeCamp, covering scientific computing and more.

name: Python.org Documentation
description: Official documentation for Python 3, providing a tutorial and reference material for the language.

name: Real Python Tutorials
description: A website offering detailed tutorials and guides on various Python topics, aimed at intermediate to advanced learners.

name: Automate the Boring Stuff with Python
description: A book by Al Sweigart that teaches how to automate tasks using Python, suitable for beginners.

name: Learn Python the Hard Way
description: A comprehensive guide by Zed Shaw designed to teach Python through exercises and repetition.

name: Python for Data Science Handbook
description: A book by Jake VanderPlas that covers data science with Python, including libraries like NumPy and pandas.

name: Python Crash Course
description: A book by Eric Matthes that provides a concise introduction to Python programming for beginners.

name: HackerRank Python Challenges
description: A series of challenges and tutorials on Python provided by HackerRank, aimed at improving coding skills.

name: Codecademy Python Track
description: An interactive course on Codecademy that teaches the fundamentals of Python programming.

name: Coursera - Python for Everybody Specialization
description: A specialization on Coursera that covers Python for data science, including data manipulation and analysis.

name: Udemy Free Python Courses
description: A collection of free Python courses available on Udemy, covering various topics from beginner to advanced levels.

name: Google's Python Class
description: An introductory course by Google that covers the basics of Python programming and its applications.
